alert.note: Alert for Southeast Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued September 30 at 10:52AM EDT until September 30 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EDT TODAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Southwest Suffolk and Southeast Suffolk Counties. * WHEN...Until noon EDT today. * COASTAL FLOOD IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. * BEACH EROSION AND FLOODING IMPACTS...Breaking waves of 4 to 6 ft will cause significant beach erosion and escarpment, with scattered areas of beach flooding and dune erosion during the time of high tide. The potential for localized overwashes is low. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. GREAT SOUTH BAY AT LINDENHURST NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.1 FT, MODERATE 3.6 FT, MAJOR 4.1 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 2.0 FT, MAJOR 2.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 30/11 AM 2.7/ 3.2 1.1/ 1.6 1.1/ 1.6 1 NONE 01/12 AM 2.6/ 3.1 1.0/ 1.5 1.1/ 1.6 0 NONE 01/12 PM 2.7/ 3.2 1.1/ 1.6 1.1/ 1.6 0 NONE 02/12 AM 2.2/ 2.7 0.7/ 1.1 0.9/ 1.4 0 NONE 02/01 PM 2.5/ 3.0 0.9/ 1.4 0.9/ 1.4 1 NONE 03/01 AM 2.2/ 2.7 0.6/ 1.1 0.9/ 1.4 1 NONE GREAT SOUTH BAY AT WEST SAYVILLE NY MLLW CATEGORIES -
